## VertexBufferInfo type

Vertex buffer information

**Signature:**

```typescript
type VertexBufferInfo = {
    buffer: StructuredBuffer;
    offset: number;
    stride: number;
    drawOffset: number;
    type: PBPrimitiveTypeInfo;
    stepMode: VertexStepMode;
};
```
